code: var client=require("contentful").createClient({space:"rnmht6wsj5nl",accessToken:"_AsjIH6r4ph08uPsSxi_61X8pBSjVP_PSOKOBXpObCM"});var getBlogPosts=function getBlogPosts(){return client.getEntries().then(function(response){return response.items;});};var getSinglePost=function getSinglePost(slug){return client.getEntries({"fields.slug":slug,content_type:"post"}).then(function(response){return response.items;});};var getTaggedPost=function getTaggedPost(tag){return client.getEntries({"fields.tags":tag,content_type:"post"}).then(function(response){return response.items;});};var getTaggedPosts=function getTaggedPosts(tag){return client.getEntries({"fields.tags":tag,content_type:"post"}).then(function(response){return response.items;});};var getSectionedPosts=function getSectionedPosts(section){return client.getEntries({"fields.section":section,content_type:"post"}).then(function(response){return response.items;});};export{getTaggedPost,getBlogPosts,getSinglePost,getTaggedPosts,getSectionedPosts};
